description: SKTZ files are renamed .ZIP archives that store several files inside that describe the drawing project. The files include .JSON and .XML files that store layer and project metadata , along with .JPG and .PNG files that represent the actual image content of each layer. Here's an example of file contents in an SKTZ file:

NOTE: Sony Sketch was a popular free drawing app known for its ease of use and creative flexibility. However, Sony shut down its online services for Sketch in 2019 and later removed the app from Google Play and the App Store.
